trans-unit.source: How to: access the predefined UTC and local time zone objects
trans-unit.target: 如何：存取預先定義的 UTC 和當地時區物件

trans-unit.source: How to access the predefined UTC and local time zone objects
trans-unit.target: 如何：存取預先定義的 UTC 和當地時區物件

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: How to: access the predefined UTC and local time zone objects
trans-unit.target: 如何：存取預先定義的 UTC 和當地時區物件

trans-unit.source: The [System.TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) class provides two properties, `Utc` and `Local`, that give your code access to predefined time zone objects.
trans-unit.target: [System.TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 類別提供兩個屬性︰`Utc` 和 `Local`，以將預先定義的時區物件存取權授與您的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This topic discusses how to access the `TimeZoneInfo` objects returned by those properties.
trans-unit.target: 本主題討論如何存取這些屬性所傳回的 `TimeZoneInfo` 物件。

trans-unit.source: To access the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) TimeZoneInfo object
trans-unit.target: 存取國際標準時間 (UTC) TimeZoneInfo 物件

trans-unit.source: Use the **static** (**Shared** in Visual Basic) [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) property to access Coordinated Universal Time.
trans-unit.target: 使用**靜態** (在 Visual Basic 中為**共用**) [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) 屬性來存取國際標準時間。

trans-unit.source: Rather than assigning the [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object returned by the property to an object variable, continue to access Coordinated Universal Time through the [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) property.
trans-unit.target: 繼續透過 [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) 屬性存取國際標準時間，而不是指派屬性傳回給物件變數的 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 物件。

trans-unit.source: To access the local time zone
trans-unit.target: 存取當地時區

trans-unit.source: Use the **static** (**Shared** in Visual Basic) [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) property to access the local system time zone.
trans-unit.target: 使用**靜態** (在 Visual Basic 中為**共用**) [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) 屬性來存取當地系統時區。

trans-unit.source: Rather than assigning the [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object returned by the property to an object variable, continue to access the local time zone through the [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) property.
trans-unit.target: 繼續透過 [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) 屬性存取當地時區，而不是指派屬性傳回給物件變數的 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 物件。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The following code uses the [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) and [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) properties to convert a time from the U.S. and Canadian Eastern Standard time zone, as well as to display the time zone name to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會使用 [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) 和 [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) 屬性轉換美國及加拿大東部標準時區的時間，以及對主控台顯示時區名稱。

trans-unit.source: You should always access the local time zone through the [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) property rather than assigning the local time zone to a [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object variable.
trans-unit.target: 您應該一律透過 [TimeZoneInfo.Local](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local) 屬性存取當地時區，而不是將當地時區指派給 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 物件變數。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you should always access Coordinated Universal Time through the [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) property rather than assigning the UTC zone to a [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object variable.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，您應該一律透過 [TimeZoneInfo.Utc](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc) 屬性存取國際標準時間，而不是將 UTC 時區指派給 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 物件變數。

trans-unit.source: This prevents the [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) object variable from being invalidated by an external method.
trans-unit.target: 這防止透過外部方法讓 [TimeZoneInfo](xref:System.TimeZoneInfo) 物件變數失效。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.target: [日期、時間及時區](index.md)

trans-unit.target: [尋找本機系統上定義的時區](finding-the-time-zones-on-local-system.md)
